statements: SELECT * FROM tee_time_reservations;
SELECT player_name, golf_course_name, tee_time FROM tee_time_reservations WHERE reservation_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tee_time_reservations WHERE golf_course_name = 'Pebble Beach Golf Links';
SELECT player_name, golf_course_name FROM tee_time_reservations WHERE booking_method = 'Online' ORDER BY tee_time DESC;
SELECT player_name, tee_time FROM tee_time_reservations ORDER BY player_name ASC, tee_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM tee_time_reservations WHERE reservation_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, tee_time FROM tee_time_reservations WHERE booking_method = 'Online' ORDER BY tee_time DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, player_name, golf_course_name FROM tee_time_reservations WHERE tee_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM tee_time_reservations;
SELECT * FROM tee_time_reservations WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY reservation_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM tee_time_reservations;
SELECT player_name, tee_time FROM tee_time_reservations WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tee_time_reservations WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT player_name, tee_time FROM tee_time_reservations WHERE reservation_id = 5;
SELECT course_name, course_location FROM golf_courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tee_time_reservations ORDER BY tee_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, tee_time FROM tee_time_reservations WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM golf_courses WHERE course_location LIKE '%beach%';
SELECT player_name, COUNT(*) AS reservation_count FROM tee_time_reservations GROUP BY player_name ORDER BY reservation_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, tee_time, course_name FROM tee_time_reservations JOIN golf_courses ON tee_time_reservations.course_id = golf_courses.course_id ORDER BY tee_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM TeeTimeReservations;
SELECT player_name, tee_time FROM TeeTimeReservations WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, location FROM GolfCourses ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT player_name, email, phone_number FROM Players WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT reservation_id, player_name, tee_time FROM TeeTimeReservations ORDER BY tee_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM TeeTimeReservations WHERE player_name = 'John Doe' AND tee_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT reservation_id, player_name, tee_time, course_name FROM TeeTimeReservations JOIN GolfCourses ON TeeTimeReservations.course_id = GolfCourses.course_id
SELECT player_name, COUNT(*) as reservation_count FROM TeeTimeReservations GROUP BY player_name ORDER BY reservation_count DESC
SELECT player_name, email FROM Players WHERE player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM TeeTimeReservations)
SELECT * FROM TeeTimeReservations WHERE course_id = (SELECT course_id FROM GolfCourses WHERE location = 'California')
SELECT * FROM GolfCourses;
SELECT name, location FROM GolfCourses;
SELECT id, name, location FROM GolfCourses ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM Players WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT id, name FROM Players WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT * FROM GolfCourses WHERE location = 'Florida'
SELECT id, name FROM Players WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT rc.id, rc.status, tt.tee_time FROM Reservations rc JOIN TeeTimes tt ON rc.tee_time_id = tt.id WHERE tt.golf_course_id = 2 ORDER BY tt.tee_time DESC

SELECT gc.name, COUNT(rt.id) AS total_reservations FROM GolfCourses gc LEFT JOIN TeeTimes tt ON gc.id = tt.golf_course_id LEFT JOIN Reservations rt ON tt.id = rt.tee_time_id GROUP BY gc.name ORDER BY total_reservations DESC

SELECT p.name AS player_name, c.name AS course_name, r.status FROM Players p JOIN Reservations r ON p.id = r.player_id JOIN TeeTimes t ON r.tee_time_id = t.id JOIN GolfCourses c ON t.golf_course_id = c.id WHERE p.phone_number LIKE '555%'
SELECT * FROM tee_times;
SELECT course_name, course_location FROM courses;
SELECT player_name, player_email, player_handicap FROM players WHERE player_handicap > 10;
SELECT tee_time_date FROM tee_times WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM tee_times WHERE tee_time_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, course_location, course_rating FROM courses WHERE course_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_handicap < 10 ORDER BY player_name DESC;

SELECT tee_times.tee_time_id, tee_times.tee_time_date, players.player_name FROM tee_times JOIN players ON tee_times.player_id = players.player_id WHERE tee_times.course_id = 1 AND tee_times.tee_time_date = '2022-05-15';

SELECT tee_time_date, player_name, reservation_time FROM tee_times JOIN reservations ON tee_times.tee_time_id = reservations.tee_time_id JOIN players ON reservations.player_id = players.player_id WHERE players.player_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
